module.name: PDFT Transformation
module.description: PDF with True Quality and Security Transformation

parameter.name: executionPath
parameter.description: Path to the PDFT.bat, ex: c:/docshifter/receiver/PDFT.bat

parameter.name: Printing
parameter.description: Restrict printing: 0: Not permitted / 1: Only Low resolution (150 DPI) / 2: Allow High resolution

parameter.name: Changes
parameter.description: Restrict changes: 0: Not permitted / 1: Allow Inserting, deleting and rotating pages / 2: Allow Filling in form fields / 3: Allow Commenting, filling in form fields / 4: Any except extracting pages
